LanguageData.AnkoleWatusiCow.label: ankole watusi cow
LanguageData.AnkoleWatusiCow.description: The Ankole-Watusi is a breed of Sanga cattle from Central Africa known for their enormous horns.

LanguageData.AnkoleWatusiCow.tools.2.label: left hoof
LanguageData.AnkoleWatusiCow.tools.3.label: right hoof
